name: Additional Labor
title: ALBR
definition: Indicates that additional labor is requested and charges will be accepted in conjunction with this Access Service Request, (e.g., Sunday or out of normal business hour installation is being requested).
validEntry:
1 = Overtime installation
2 = Testing with other providers
3 = Other labor
4 = Overtime installation and testing with other providers
5 = Overtime and other labor
6 = Testing with other providers and other labor
7 = Overtime installation, testing with other providers and
other labor
usageNotes: Optional when the ACT field is “N”, “C”, “M” or “T”, otherwise prohibited.
fieldNotes: If other labor is requested, the specific labor will be determined in verbal contact between the provider installation-control office and the customer implementation contact.
It is assumed the initiator has the authority to authorize these requests.
Entry in this field is not required if a “Y” has been entered in the Expedite (EXP) field.
